metaface.client
Class VHMLOutputTagReader

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      metaface.client.VHMLOutputTagReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
class VHMLOutputTagReader
extends DefaultHandler

This class is used to read pre-rendered Facial Animation Parameters (FAPs), phonemes, Uniform Resource Locators (URLs) and text from an eXtensible Markup Language (XML) file.

These files are formed during presynthesis of Virtual Human Markup Language (VHML) XML documents

These files are in the form of:
<eca_synthesis>
  <text>the text spoken by the ECA</text>
  <url target="name.of.browser.frame">http://some.url.here</url>
  <url target="another.browser.frame">http://another.url.here</url>
  ....
  <phonemes>
    A list of the ECA phonemes for speech
  <phonemes>
  <faps>
    A list of the MPEG-4 FAPs for facial animation
  <faps>
</eca_synthesis>

Follow this link to retrieve the Document Type Definition vhml_output.dtd Follow this link to retrieve an example XML file vhml_example.xml

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard
See Also:
VHMLOutputReader, PreSynthesise
